640080.name: Vrifier
640080.description:
Vrifier is a 3D model & data viewer for extended realities with built-in optimization and export for large models and datasets. Vrifier is designed to handle large and complex meshes. Interface is customized for quick and easy 3D viewing for both professional and casual use.

MAIN FEATURES

Control the optimization process

Import large models and define how you want to optimize the model for viewing in virtual and augmented reality. Vrifier gives you the control to create multiple simplified versions of your models.

Progressive point cloud loading

Vrifier’s support for progressive loading of point clouds makes it possible to bring over 8 billion points to be viewed in virtual reality.
(While using the Potree format)

Viewpoints

Save viewpoints to your models and easily navigate back to them whenever you want. Create presentations of important locations to show others.

Wide import file formats support

Current officially supported file formats include .obj, .fbx, .ifc, .stl, .ply and .xyz.
Many other formats can also be imported, but import quality has not been confirmed.

Export optimized models

Optimized models can be exported from Vrifier for later use. Currently Vrifier supports exporting models in standard .obj and .fbx, as well as instantly loading proprietary formats .vrf and .vrx.

Cross-platform support

Vrifier works currently with HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality headsets.

Co-creation model

Some features are developed to meet the demands of the industry on request;
  • Teatime Photogrammetry Toolkit (DLC) with the Department of Geosciences and Geography, University of Helsinki, Finland.
  • Scene customization and kiosk mode features with 3DVisLab, University of Dundee, Scotland UK.
Organizations are encouraged to get in touch and guide our features to meet their needs through our co-creation partnership program.
